pages.text: $(o)It's cold... it is so cold$(br2)The Lamb has been devoured, from Nothingness, from Wolves, from Dragons, from the Winter, from Endings, from Despair, from Renewal, from itself.$(br2)Its corpse gave birth to coldness, only coldness, nothing more.$(br2)$(o)The Lamb is forgotten and this is the memory$()
This $(item)$(l:alchemy/entry_thoughts_battling)memory$(), $(l:manipulation/entry_basin)infused$() with the purest coldness of $(l:lessons/lesson_collection)three winters$().
